file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 35-20-18-02 - GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to discard the oxygen generator. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY POST-MOD SB GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - DIS- 35-20-18-960-801-A 145-35-0008 CARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 35-20-18 Page 1 of 4 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-20-18-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD SB 145-35-0008 2. GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - DISCARD A. General (1) The function of this procedure is to discard the gaseous oxygen cylinder. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 35-20-18-000-801-A/400 GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 35-20-18-400-801-A/400 GASEOUS OXYGEN CYLINDER - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Dispensing units installed in the lavatory. I. Discard Gaseous Oxygen Cylinder (Figure 201) • WARNING: ALWAYS BE CAREFUL NOT TO ACCIDENTALLY PULL THE LANYARDS OR FIRING PIN OF A OXYGEN CYLINDER NOT USED. THE REMOVAL OF THE FIRING PIN FROM THE OXYGEN CYLINDER WILL START THE FLOW OF OXYGEN AND YOU CANNOT STOP IT UNTIL THE CYLINDER IS EMPTY. • DO NOT USE OIL AND OTHER PETROLEUM-BASE LUBRICANTS ON THE OXYGEN EQUIPMENT. THIS COULD CAUSE A DANGEROUS FIRE AND BAD INJURY TO PERSONS. • KEEP ALL SOURCES OF IGNITION (HOT EXHAUST, SPARKS, FLAMES, SMOKING) AWAY FROM THE OXYGEN SERVICING AREA. SUBTASK 960-002-A NOTE: Prepare a clean area and work surface before you start the maintenance procedures. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 35-20-18 Page 2 of 4 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Get access to the gaseous oxygen cylinder. (2) Remove the gaseous oxygen cylinder (AMM TASK 35-20-18-000-801-A/400). (3) Discard the gaseous oxygen cylinder removed in the previous step. (4) Install a new gaseous oxygen cylinder (AMM TASK 35-20-18-400-801-A/400). NOTE: • Make sure that the safety plug indicator cap is green and that the firing pin is in place for the gaseous oxygen cylinder. • Make sure that the lifetime date is satisfactory. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 35-20-18 Page 3 of 4 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
